mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM qyjc_sy.qy_user_info q WHERE q.IF_REMOVED ='N'
select count(1) from qy_user_info q left join qy_user_company c on q.USER_ID=c.USER_ID left join qy_user_team t on q.USER_ID=t.USER_ID WHERE q.IF_REMOVED ='N' and (t.IFEXAMINE='Y' or c.IFEXAMINE='Y')
select count(1) from qy_user_info q left join qy_user_company c on q.USER_ID=c.USER_ID WHERE q.IF_REMOVED ='N' and c.IFEXAMINE='Y'
select count(1) from qy_user_info q left join qy_user_team t on q.USER_ID=t.USER_ID WHERE q.IF_REMOVED ='N' and t.IFEXAMINE='Y'

SELECT CASE WHEN c.id IS NOT NULL THEN '企业' WHEN t.id IS NOT NULL THEN '创业团队' WHEN c.id IS NULL AND t.id IS NULL THEN '未补全信息用户' END AS areas,COUNT(1) AS number FROM qy_user_info q LEFT JOIN qy_user_company c ON q.USER_ID = c.USER_ID LEFT JOIN qy_user_team t ON q.USER_ID = t.USER_ID WHERE q.IF_REMOVED = 'N' GROUP BY areas

SELECT CASE SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX( LEFT ( c.ORGN_IDENTIFY, CHAR_LENGTH( c.ORGN_IDENTIFY )- 1 ), ';', topic.help_topic_id + 1 ) , ';',- 1 ) WHEN 'ORGN_RECOGNITION01' THEN '高新技术产业' WHEN 'ORGN_RECOGNITION06' THEN '市科技型企业' WHEN 'ORGN_RECOGNITION02' THEN '市小巨人企业' WHEN 'ORGN_RECOGNITION03' THEN '市小巨人培育企业' WHEN 'ORGN_RECOGNITION05' THEN '市高新技术培育企业' WHEN 'ORGN_RECOGNITION99' THEN '以上都不是' WHEN 'ORGN_RECOGNITION04' THEN '区小巨人企业'
END AS areas , COUNT(1) AS number FROM qy_user_info q
LEFT JOIN qy_user_company c ON q.USER_ID = c.USER_ID JOIN mysql.help_topic topic ON topic.help_topic_id < ( LENGTH( LEFT ( c.ORGN_IDENTIFY, CHAR_LENGTH( c.ORGN_IDENTIFY )- 1 ) ) - LENGTH( REPLACE ( LEFT ( c.ORGN_IDENTIFY, CHAR_LENGTH(c.ORGN_IDENTIFY )- 1 ), ';', '' ) ) + 1 )
WHERE q.IF_REMOVED = 'N' AND c.IFEXAMINE='Y' AND SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX( LEFT ( c.ORGN_IDENTIFY, CHAR_LENGTH( c.ORGN_IDENTIFY )- 1 ), ';', topic.help_topic_id + 1 ) , ';',- 1 ) <> '' GROUP BY areas order by number desc

SELECT COUNT( 1 ) AS number, COUNT( CASE WHEN c.IFEXAMINE = 'Y' THEN 1 END ) AS number2, YEAR ( q.REG_DATE ) AS areas FROM qy_user_info q JOIN qy_user_company c ON q.USER_ID = c.USER_ID WHERE q.IF_REMOVED = 'N' GROUP BY YEAR ( q.REG_DATE )

SELECT COUNT( 1 ) AS number, COUNT( CASE WHEN c.IFEXAMINE = 'Y' THEN 1 END ) AS number2 , DATE_FORMAT(q.REG_DATE,'%Y-%m')AS areas FROM qy_user_info q JOIN qy_user_company c ON q.USER_ID = c.USER_ID WHERE q.IF_REMOVED = 'N' AND YEAR ( q.REG_DATE )= 2019 GROUP BY MONTH ( q.REG_DATE)

SELECT COUNT( 1 ) AS number, COUNT( CASE WHEN c.IFEXAMINE = 'Y' OR t.IFEXAMINE = 'Y' THEN 1 END ) AS number2 , YEAR ( q.REG_DATE ) AS areas FROM qy_user_info q LEFT JOIN qy_user_company c ON q.USER_ID = c.USER_ID LEFT JOIN qy_user_team t ON q.USER_ID = t.USER_ID WHERE q.IF_REMOVED = 'N' GROUP BY YEAR ( q.REG_DATE)

SELECT count( 1 ) AS number, count( CASE WHEN c.IFEXAMINE = 'Y' OR t.IFEXAMINE = 'Y' THEN 1 END ) AS number2 , MONTH ( q.REG_DATE ) AS areas FROM qy_user_info q LEFT JOIN qy_user_company c ON q.USER_ID = c.USER_ID LEFT JOIN qy_user_team t ON q.USER_ID = t.USER_ID WHERE q.IF_REMOVED = 'N' AND Year ( q.REG_DATE )= 2019 GROUP BY MONTH ( q.REG_DATE)

SELECT CASE WHEN c.ZC_CITY != '沈阳市' THEN '其他区县' WHEN c.ZC_DISTRICT='' THEN '区域未填写' ELSE ZC_DISTRICT END AS areas, COUNT(1) AS number FROM qy_user_info q LEFT JOIN qy_user_company c ON q.USER_ID = c.USER_ID WHERE q.IF_REMOVED = 'N' AND c.IFEXAMINE = 'Y'
GROUP BY areas order by number desc

SELECT CASE ORGN_TYPE WHEN 'ORGN_NATURE01' THEN '有限责任公司' WHEN 'ORGN_NATURE02' THEN '股份有限公司' WHEN 'ORGN_NATURE03' THEN '国有独资公司' WHEN 'ORGN_NATURE04' THEN '个人独资公司' WHEN 'ORGN_NATURE05' THEN '合伙企业' WHEN 'ORGN_NATURE06' THEN '个体工商户' WHEN 'ORGN_NATURE07' THEN '外商投资企业' WHEN 'ORGN_NATURE08' THEN '私营企业' WHEN 'ORGN_NATURE09' THEN '全民所有制企业' WHEN 'ORGN_NATURE10' THEN '集体所有制企业' WHEN 'ORGN_NATURE99' THEN '其他' WHEN ORGN_TYPE IS NULL THEN '类型未填写' END AS areas
,COUNT(1) AS number FROM qy_user_info q LEFT JOIN qy_user_company c ON q.USER_ID = c.USER_ID WHERE q.IF_REMOVED = 'N' AND c.IFEXAMINE = 'Y' AND ORGN_TYPE <> '' GROUP BY areas ORDER BY COUNT(1)

SELECT YEAR ( q.REG_DATE ) AS areas, COUNT( 1 ) AS number, COUNT( CASE WHEN t.IFEXAMINE = 'Y' THEN 1 END ) AS number2 FROM qy_user_info q LEFT JOIN qy_user_team t ON q.USER_ID = t.USER_ID WHERE q.IF_REMOVED = 'N' AND q.USER_TYPE='team' GROUP BY YEAR ( q.REG_DATE)

SELECT TX_DISTRICT AS areas,COUNT(1) AS number FROM qy_user_info q LEFT JOIN qy_user_team t ON q.USER_ID = t.USER_ID WHERE q.IF_REMOVED = 'N' AND t.IFEXAMINE = 'Y' GROUP BY t.TX_PROVINCE,t.TX_CITY,TX_DISTRICT
